alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 12:14PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County through 100 PM MST... At 1212 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Valle, or 42 miles northwest of Flagstaff, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Coconino County. This includes State Route 64 between mile markers 192 and 202. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Large amounts of small hail can make roadways slippery.
